entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (13)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (13)20161223
I played for a long time today and did a ton of quests. I think I
might be at the end of the available quests at this point in the
game (Chapter 4.) However, I currently am trying to grind out
access to the Ultima Blade. I'm pretty sure that I got the Horn I
need before but that I sold it without knowing it was important. I
could have sold many other things, but sold it because it had a
high price tag. :'(

Total time: 36:38

entry.title: Movie: The Huntsman: Winter's War, starring Chris Hemsworth (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: The Huntsman: Winter's War, starring Chris Hemsworth (2016)20161223
These seems like it would be a direct-to-video movie because of the
bizarre connection to the previous movie that just feels like an
excuse to have a sequel. Nevertheless, the acting and effects were
all top-notch. If it were just a Snow Queen movie in the style of
the Snow White movie, it would have been totally fine. So from that
perspective, it was quite interesting. I found the design of the
Goblins to be great and the relationship between the characters
very interesting.
  • Movies
  • 2016

I finished the game. I did a little bit of grinding on the last
hand of the last level before finally getting the 25 spot
combo. It was pretty rad. The game has a very anti-climactic end
to the story, but the gameplay was very fun.

entry.title: Movie: Jason Bourne, starring Matt Damon (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: Jason Bourne, starring Matt Damon (2016)20161222
This movie had all the things a Bourne movie should have, except
for an interesting plot. The stakes are just not very high because
it's so obvious what happened with his father that why do we really
need to have it confirmed. We never find out what Ironhand is or
why it is interesting. Finally, the whole thing about the Internet
company, while trying to be "ripped from the headlines" is actually
too much so, because I assume that this is already happening, so
there's really no stakes at all. Nevertheless, the actiony parts
were fun. Although the Greek protest in the beginning was
nonsensical.
  • Movies
  • 2016

entry.title: Movie: The Legend of Tarzan, starring Alexander Skarsgård (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: The Legend of Tarzan, starring Alexander Skarsgård (2016)20161220
I was surprised at the structure of this story. I assumed it would
go through the whole origin story, but it was very interesting to
start from the post-Africa Tarzan and then introduce things. It was
very cool. I liked the story, although it definitely has the "White
Savior" problem.
  • Movies
  • 2016

entry.title: Movie: Rogue One, starring Felicity Jones (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: Rogue One, starring Felicity Jones (2016)20161220
I really enjoyed this movie. I loved the way it ended and the way
the story developed. I loved the holes in the previous plot that it
filled in. The characters were really entertaining. All around,
excellent. I think I liked The Force Awakens more, but this was a
really great movie. I liked the way the cameos were worked in. It
was very striking that there was no opening crawl.
  • Movies
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (10)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 15 (PS4, 2016) (10)20161219
I played for about two hours and did a bunch of missions. I went
through a cavern but didn't find the royal tomb in it. Lame! I
realized how the Max HP system worked and had to go to sleep to
get it all back. It was very annoying.

Total time: 29:43
